string.name: SKPackageAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed. [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: A package with the name %0:s is already installed. Do you want to uninstall it and install the new one?

string.name: SKKeyboardAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed. [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: A keyboard with the name '%0:s' is already installed. If you continue, it will be uninstalled before the new one is installed. Continue?

string.name: SKKeyboardPartOfPackage
string.comment: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: The keyboard '%0:s' is part of package '%1:s'. You must uninstall the entire package. Continue?

string.name: SKInstallOnlyAsAdmin
string.comment: Notice of user ineligibility to install/uninstall keyboards [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: You can only install or uninstall keyboards as Administrator. Use Control Panel to select languages for use as a normal user.

string.name: SKSurrogatesRequiresRestart

resources.string: Changing the setting of Surrogates requires Windows to be restarted. Do you want to restart Windows now?

resources.string: The package or keyboard '%0:s' does not include any introductory help.

resources.string: This operating system is not supported.

resources.string: The following fonts will also be uninstalled: %0:s.

string.name: SKActivation_OnlineNow
string.comment: Request for confirmation that the present activation method is desired [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: Do you want to activate $(SKShortApplicationTitle) online now with licence number %0:s? If you click No, you can choose from alternate activation methods.

string.name: SKUnicodeData_Build
string.comment: Request to build Unicode Chracter Map database [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: The Character Map has a database of characters that needs to be built before it can be used. Build it now?

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseCouldNotBeDeleted
string.comment: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: The Unicode Character database could not be deleted for a rebuild. Error details are: %0:s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_CouldNotCreateDatabase
string.comment: Error creating Unicode Character Map database [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: The Unicode Character database could not be created and has been disabled. Error details are: %0:s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseLoadFailedRebuild
string.comment: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild. [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: The Unicode character database did not load successfully (%0:s). Rebuild it now?

string.name: SKErrorActivatingBrowser
string.comment: General URL error [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: Cannot activate browser or email program for this URL.

string.name: SKCouldNotPrintKeyboard
string.comment: Keyboard printing error [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string: The keyboard could not be printed successfully. Please save to a web page and print manually.

string.name: SKCannotStartProduct
string.comment: Error from Keyman Desktop failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.241.0)]

resources.string:
Keyman Desktop failed to start. Please check your security settings to make sure that the program keyman.exe is allowed to start before continuing. The error returned was:
"%0:s"
Do you want to try and start Keyman Desktop again now?

string.name: SKDebuggingWarning
string.comment: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab [Formatted Messages: FormatString (7.0.230.0)]

resources.string:
Keyman Desktop debug information will be stored in a log file called %LOCALAPPDATA%\Keyman\Diag\system#.etl (where # is a number). You should exit Keyman Desktop before attempting to delete this file.
WARNING: This file can grow large very quickly. Enabling debugging may slow down your system and should only be done if advised by technical support.
PRIVACY WARNING: Please note that the debug logfile records all keystrokes that you type. You should only turn on the debug log for the duration of a debugging or diagnostic session.
